channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m a founder—and ‘founder mode’ is missing a key to growth
item.description: C-level executives have important skills, experience, and knowledge that founders lack—and that startups need in order to scale.

item.title: Tiger Global plans to join OpenAI’s funding round at more than $150 billion valuation
item.description: Tiger Global is planning to join OpenAI's buzzy new funding round that would value the AI startup at more than $150 billion.

item.title: GE HealthCare’s stock pulls back after former parent sells off half its stake
Here are the discounts and deals carriers are offering for the iPhone 16
item.description: Get Apple’s latest phone for free from some cellular providers.

item.title: JPMorgan sees Netflix becoming a major advertising player, stock going to $750
item.description: The Wall Street firm reaffirmed its bullish stance on the stock amid an anticipated boost in scale and monetization next year.

item.title: Why Nvidia and Broadcom shares can’t save the chip sector by themselves
Chinese grumble about Beijing’s decision to hike the retirement age: ‘I’ll just have to bear the three extra years of work’
item.description: "Don't feel too sad, everyone; in 15 years, the retirement age will probably be raised again," one Chinese netizen wrote.

item.title: Adobe shares fall 9% on weak fourth-quarter guidance
item.description: Adobe shares fell a day after the company released third-quarter results that offered weak guidance.

item.title: How a onetime football standout landed in prison for stealing COVID relief aid
Buckingham Palace is clashing with animal rights groups over the guards’ iconic bearskin caps
item.description: The hats, made of black bear fur, cost more than $2,600 apiece—up 30% from last year.

item.title: Uber and Waymo to offer driverless ride-sharing trips in Austin and Atlanta
item.description: Uber will offer driverless ride-sharing trips with Waymo in Austin and Atlanta starting early 2025

item.title: Consumer sentiment climbs to 5-month high as worries about inflation ease
I’ve led multiple tech businesses. This is the biggest mistake startup leaders make
item.description: Startup leaders obsessed with valuations and technology overlook something more important at their peril.

item.title: United Airlines to offer free Wi-Fi using Starlink from Elon Musk's SpaceX
item.description: Starlink has already signed deals with Hawaiian Airlines and semi-private operator JSX.

item.title: Here’s why the ‘Harris trade’ could be ‘completely overblown’
